About.title: Eduardo Schelive
About.subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about modern technologies and scalable solutions

whoAmI.title: Who Am I
whoAmI.description1: I'm a full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience building web applications and distributed systems. I specialize in JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems and modern development practices.
whoAmI.description2: Throughout my career, I've worked with startups and enterprise companies, helping them build scalable solutions that solve real-world problems. I'm passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and developer experience.
whoAmI.description3: When I'm not coding, you can find me writing technical articles, contributing to open source projects, or exploring new technologies that can improve the way we build software.

job1.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
job1.description: Leading development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users. Built scalable APIs and modern web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS.

job2.title: Full-Stack Developer
job2.description: Developed and maintained e-commerce platform from scratch. Implemented payment systems, inventory management, and real-time analytics dashboard.

job3.title: Frontend Developer
job3.description: Created responsive web applications for various clients. Specialized in performance optimization and modern JavaScript frameworks.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Interested in collaborating? I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects.
